website_summaries.verdict: This laminator offers user-friendly features in a compact design, and is made by a trusted brand.
pros: Produces reliable lamination thanks to excellent temperature control
Heat Guard technology means you can touch items right out of the machine
cons: Not as speedy as you might expect for the price

customer_reviews.title: Laminator Review
customer_reviews.text: It was an awesome purchase. Thanks for the great transaction! I would definitely recommend this item to others interested in a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie T.

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work thinking for the price it would work great. Ruined multiple things i needed and eventually completely got jammed with an entire piece of laminate sheet inside it. I could not even get it out. I sent it back with the entire piece still in there. I needed a Laminator so i went to Walmart and bought a $20 one and it works 100x better than this one. The projects are coming out clear and unwrinkled. SAVE YOUR MONEY DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laminator. Heats up quickly. Does a good job. Light weight & easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly straight out of the box. No setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly straight out of the box. No setup required, plug and laminate. We did 50 laminations the day we unboxed it without a single overheat, or issue. He could smell a slight odor from the heating of the lamination pouches but no one else did. We used swingline speed pouches (8.5x11 lamination pouches that feed through sideways).
customer_reviews.author: Ginny's Daily Living Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Little Laminator
customer_reviews.text: As a preschool teacher, I laminate practically EVERYTHING. I used this laminator half a dozen times within 24 hours of receiving it and it does a beautiful job! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Debem

customer_reviews.title: Laminating made easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for personal laminating or small classroom jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Godard

customer_reviews.title: a great laminator
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this laminator. I laminate everything now. You will not be disappointed with the quality of this machine. As a side note, it is loud but I do not leave it on. I only turn it on when I need to use it and then shut it down shortly after it cools. Its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: nesnakes

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: This little laminator does a great job at a very reasonable price. I don't laminate a whole lot, but so far not a crease or a crinkle, and so easy to use (use 3mm Scotch laminating pouches). Sure beat running to the local Staples every time I need something laminated.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as advertised. Would recommend it to anyone. I have ran hundreds of laminations through it without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laminator!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Laminator! Arrived just when I needed it most--in exactly 2 days!! And, it works beautifully! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday! Oh my gosh she loves it! She is laminateing everything in sight! Works great beautiful results! You can write on it with dry erase markers and wipe off and reuse! Laminator does not get hot to the touch and very low odor it any when in use! Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets purchasing this laminator it's just as advertised and works great. I recommend this product to other small business owners.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A HOME PRODUCT THAT COULD EASILY HANDLE A PROFESSIONALS NEEDS
customer_reviews.author: the truth about

customer_reviews.title: Crap! do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for a few weeks and it got jammed, without a way to fix it!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: LAMINATOR REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: LAMINATOR WORK WELL AND AS EXPECTED! I'M HAPPY WITH IT AND THE PURCHASE OF IT! GOOD VALUE FOR THE DOLLAR!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 4 months. Not worth the money. Only used a few times. Junk😂
customer_reviews.author: sandra shofstall

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laminator for a few years now and I love it. I have laminated hundreds of items with it and never had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: A great choice
customer_reviews.text: It does an excellent job, looks sleek and sexy, and doesn't take up too much space on the shelf in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Durable for daily usage in a classroom setting. Easy to take apart when paper had got stuck. Although I wish it would warm up faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Great but 1st time use warning
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine and good value for the money. The only negative is the first item I put in got jammed and item lost. I believe this happened because I needed to let the machine warm up a bit because after the first usage I've had zero repeat issues. I recommend letting warm up good first time and using a item you are not going to be upset if it gets jammed in because it was hell to get out and item ruined.
customer_reviews.author: mig

customer_reviews.title: A loud pop and then smoke came out of the sides - never did get to laminate anything
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and let it sit for six months on my desk before I tried to use it. When the day came, I plugged it in and waited for it to heat up. I heard a loud pop and then saw smoke coming out of the sides so I turned it off. That was the end of that. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: R Dail

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding laminator!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few different laminators over the years--including professional grade laminators--and I can say with confidence that there are no downsides to this model. It is well-built, well-designed and it works great. I don't anticipate ever needing to buy another laminator. I could not recommend this product more wholeheartedly. Fellowes also makes a professional version 12.5" size of this laminator. I have both and they both work great. The primary difference between the two is the size. The 12.5" version will handle larger items and therefor has a much larger footprint on a table or countertop. For most standard uses, however, this model should be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: TINETQL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Even though I am reviewing this through the Amazon Vine program, that does not hype up my rating in any way. At first I wasn't even sure if I would find much use for this laminator but now I can't imagine being without one. I create handmade one-of-a-kind cards and like to keep a sample on hand for future reference. To prevent deterioration from humidity even though I preserve the paper I decided to give the laminator a try. I'm glad I did. Being new to laminators, I have no way to compare this unit to others, but I have had no problems whatsoever and using it is very easy to do. Great unit, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Condor

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a laminating machine for some time now. This one doesn't get too hot to handle, operates fairly quickly, and isn't noisy. I'm using it for laminating recipes and craft instructions - things I refer to often. It's intended for personal home/office use not heavy duty usage therefore it meets my needs perfectly. I found it simple to use, intuitive actually, and it does a great job. Professional looking enough that I will be laminating a document often given to my new clients.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fellowes Cosmic 2 95 Personal Laminator, 9.5-Inch (5725601) is easy to operate. It has instructions that can be followed easily. It laminates documents very quickly without much effort. It is safe to touch as it has inbuilt heat-guard technology. It comes with 10 letter sized pouches, so we do not need to buy the pouches separately for first few initial laminations. It is light and easy to handle which is a plus point. The laminated documents come out water-proofed. I'm very satisfied with this product and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned a cheaper laminator by Scotch that bent every single front right corner. I purchased this one to replace it! I am so happy I picked this one. It worked right out the box, taking about 5 minutes to warm up. Not only did it work as it should, it also FIXED all of the bad bent/warped corners from the Scotch one, by re running them through this one! It also does Cold Laminations and 3mil, 4mil and 5mil. This must be the best laminator there is under $100!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Reed

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how well this laminator would hold under heavy use, but for the occasional tasks I ask of it, it seems well-suited. It is light, easy to store, and I have experienced no heating problems with it. Most of the items I laminate are smaller, but I have had no problems with keeping items aligned properly, as some other reviewers have mentioned. If you are looking to laminate items on an occasional basis, this certainly will do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Chefdevergue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laminator unit and I'm very pleased with it. It's quite attractive--sleek, modern color and feel--and fits in nicely in my home office decor. It heats up in just a few minutes, laminates perfectly, and is easily stored in a small space when not in use. I'm a one-person operation so the unit fits my needs nicely. If you work in an office with a lot of users, be sure to read the description closely to see if it's going to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Loren W. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a home office and this fits the bill. This laminator is a good size, but the actual footprint is small compared to others. Fellowes is a trusted branc so I imagine it will last a long time. The only this that kept it from 5 stars is that it feels a little lightweight and flimsy compared to the commercial one I used when I worked outside the home. But then that one cost twice as much. I think it will be fine for me thought.
customer_reviews.author: pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Competent performer
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well this laminator worked and how easy it was to use, especially for the price. The laminator is fast and efficient and does a good job. It was easy and intuitive to operate, without a lot of confusing buttons. I found the laminating pouches provided about the right thickness for most jobs. It is great for laminating often-used recipes and for creating some whiteboard-type projects for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very lightweight and easy to use, plus it comes with a pack of 10 letter size pouches so you can laminate stuff as soon as your machine arrives. I recommend ordering a larger box of pouches to go with it, if you plan on laminating more than a few documents. Helpful hint: DON'T laminate your social security card. Don't do it! Laminate anything else you want, just not that. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hale

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: As a homeschooler there are many things over the years that I laminated. I used to just use clear contact paper for some things. Others I would have laminated at a print shop. This is a great product to have on hand for a wide variety of uses. It is somewhat larger than I expected, so takes up more room in my office than I would like. It does work great and is easy to use. With temperature control and the ability to handle different sizes, it gives a lot of versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Cook

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Though this may not be the tiniest personal laminator on the market, a little room on a desk allows for one of the handiest small-scale laminators I have seen. It's sleek and attractive, easy to work, and allows for a variety of sizes of things to be laminated. Heats up fast and does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great study aid
customer_reviews.text: I use it to laminate study cards so they dont get worn out too quick. I also laminate some worksheets in subjects that I struggle with. With laminated sheets, I can easily wipe off what I had written before so I can do the material over and over until it sticks in my brain.
customer_reviews.author: Turtles all the Way Down

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: "This laminator is compact and easy to use and store. The results are as professional as if you had them done at a retail store. "As a homeschooling parent this will be great for projects as well as for record keeping. Very satisfied."
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ehrbar

customer_reviews.title: Just right for small office!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we need for small amount of office laminating we do at our church
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laminator
customer_reviews.text: I have a cool laminator that had I been able to find the replacement cartridge I would not have bought this one. This one does a nice job on the hot setting. It did not work as well on the cold. It is a nice compact size and that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C Fleegal

product_meta.title: Fellowes Laminator Cosmic 2 95, 9.5 Inch Laminating Machine, with Laminating Pouches Kit (5725601),White
product_meta.description: Size:9.5 InchFellowes, the leader in laminating products, delivers the best performance and quality to preserve and protect important documents. Fellowes laminators can be used in the home, office, or classroom for creating quick, long-lasting professional and fun projects. You can make menus, signs and posters durable. Quickly and easily laminate photos, business cards, picture cards, and certificates. Create bookmarks, calendars, flash cards, or jewelry with ease. Fellowes laminators feature robust roller systems for quick, consistent lamination and quality throughput at high speeds. By providing the best laminator technology we ensure smooth, high quality laminating results. The Fellowes Cosmic 2 95 Pouch Laminator is a user-friendly personal laminating machine perfect for occasional use in the home or small office. The Cosmic 2 95 is designed for use with 3mil laminating pouches for documents or photos, however, it will handle up to 5mil thick pouches for index card size or smaller. The 9.5 inch throat size will accept multiple document sizes, and a document carrier is not required. Featuring HeatGuard Technology that keeps the heat inside so the laminator is cool to the touch, and an anti-jam release lever, you'll be assured the Cosmic 2 is safe to use for you and your materials. It heats up in 5 minutes, laminates 12 inches per minute, and has 3 temperature settings, including for cold lamination. The Fellowes Cosmic 2 95 is sure to meet your occasional light laminating needs with fantastic results.
feature_bullets: Advanced temperature control for consistent lamination quality
HeatGuard Technology - Double-walled insulation keeps heat inside so laminator is comfortable to touch
Hot lamination for 3-mil or 5 mil and cold settings for self-adhesive pouches
Ready for heated lamination in just five minutes
Jam Release lever disengages pouch for re-centering or removal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
